e5: An ethical reporting policy should prioritize transparency and avoid deliberate bias or misleading information exploiting investors. This includes maintaining legal compliance to prevent investigations by the SEC while ensuring investor protection over the long term.
e6: Yes, in addition to the concerns raised by the CFO, it may be useful to ask about potential strategies for communicating the new policy to investors effectively and minimizing negative impacts on retail investors. The board might also explore implementing measures to ensure that all investors have equal access to accurate information and the ability to make informed decisions.
